channel.title: ACRS
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: Provides interim rept on review of util application for authorization to operate facility.Pending satisfactory completion of const & preoperational testing,facility can operate w/o undue risk to public health & safety.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL MEMORANDUM, MEMORANDUMS-CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC/ACRS

item.title: Responds to 770131 ltr re interpretation of ACRS 770117 rept on facility.ACRS concurs w/consultants re Stafford fault zone & w/recommendation that min SSE of 0.2 g should be used for new CP applicants.Related correspondence.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL MEMORANDUM, MEMORANDUMS-CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC/ACRS

item.title: Advises that ACRS completed review of Stafford fault zone. Geological & seismological info supports conclusion that zone is not capable per 10CFR100,App A.No change in seismic design basis warranted.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL MEMORANDUM, MEMORANDUMS-CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC/ACRS

item.title: Submits recommendations for future design practice re reactor pressure vessels.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL MEMORANDUM, MEMORANDUMS-CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC/ACRS

item.title: Submits possible subjs for discussion at 700728-29 meetings.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL MEMORANDUM, MEMORANDUMS-CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC/ACRS

item.title: Advises that Okrent & Isbin have asked for subcommittee meeting to discuss burnout limits,fuel performance & ECCS performance during LOCA.Tentative agenda encl.W/o encl.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL MEMORANDUM, MEMORANDUMS-CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC/ACRS

item.title: Submits rept on evaluation models for Commission criteria for ECCS for LWRs addressed at ACRS 741114-16 meeting. Approved models will aid in licensing review.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL MEMORANDUM, MEMORANDUMS-CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC/ACRS

item.title: Summary of ACRS 75th meeting on 660714-16 re review of CP application.Safety issues can be resolved prior to OL issuance.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL MEMORANDUM, MEMORANDUMS-CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC/ACRS

item.title: Submits questions for evaluation re facility reactor.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL MEMORANDUM, MEMORANDUMS-CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC/ACRS

item.title: Submits tentative agenda for 700528 facility subcommittee meeting.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL MEMORANDUM, MEMORANDUMS-CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC/ACRS

item.title: Discusses 75th ACRS meeting on 660714-16 re review of applicant request to authorize const of facility.CP should be issued.Draft provisional CP & Certificate of Svc encl.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL MEMORANDUM, MEMORANDUMS-CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC/ACRS

item.title: Transcript of ACRS 730711 meeting in Washington,DC re OL application.Pp 1-196.

item.author: NRC/ACRS

item.title: Summarizes ACRS 820304-06 meeting re licensee proposal to perform sys interactions study.Util should conduct proposed walkdown phase of study during upcoming plant shutdown for refueling.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL MEMORANDUM, MEMORANDUMS-CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC/ACRS
